section.p: This sample is just to provide some very simple demonstration how to generate any graphical content with XSLT-Conref.

The properties of the surrounding box are static. The only dynamic content is the text which is taken from the title of the reference. You can see this when changing the title and refreshing the XSLT-Conref – without having to save the file first. The text is simply printed centered with constant text size. No automated line wrapping or scaling is supported, yet.
